name: SCC Notifications
tagline: Changing the way you get updates!
body:
### Welcome to SCC Notifications!

You have reached the official website for the SCC Notifications app.
I will use this page to post updates, as well as tutorials for using
the application. I hope you enjoy the app, and that it makes your life
just a little bit easier!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
